OK, I need some feed back. Does anyone have a problem with Shadow 
Wing coming back? Yes? No? Need opinions here people.  Please let me 
know.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine dashed down the hillside to Shadow Wings side, she was 
> pretty badly beaten (To put it lightly. He croutched at her side, 
> again he'd failed in his mission and someone got hurt. The wolfbot 
> raised his claws realizing he had to act fast if there was any hope 
> of reviving her spark "Computer prepare to activate internal 
repairs "
> 
> "No damage indicated" was the reply. Lunarpine brought his claws 
down 
> slashing himself across the chest.
> 
> He reached in grabbing live wires attempting to hook them through 
> Shadow Wings system as well as his own. It was a long shot but the 
> way he saw it it was his only shot there was a chance that his 
spark 
> could join the matrix along with hers. The wolfbot would rather 
spend 
> eternity in the matrix with her than spend one more moment on 
ancient 
> earth without her.
> 
> He opened his mouth one more time, "Anyone nearby please help us." 
> With those last desperate words Lunarpine collapsed into stasis 
lock 
> atop the motionless body of Shadow Wing.
> 
> (Posibilities 1Shadow Wing is saved 2Shadow Wings spark is stored 
in 
> Lunarpines body for future reference 3 Both are trapped inside the 
> Matrix. 4 Both remain in stasis lock for future reference. 5 
anything 
> Logo can think of.)
> 
> Forget about this part of the post, I found the retreat after I 
wrote 
> it.
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OK here I go again
> > 
>  > 12034 Lunarpine charges downhill fireing at Serpentor as he goes.
